uk.ac.uea.activityprogram.Controllers

Class UserCalendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • uk.ac.uea.activityprogram.Controllers.BaseCalendar
        • uk.ac.uea.activityprogram.Controllers.UserCalendar

  • public class UserCalendar
extends BaseCalendar
    The user calendar, extends the Base Calendar allowing to have a calendar interface with several views. Shows the events the user has subscribed to and allows to unsubscribe and view more details about them.

    • Method Detail

      • onMonthChange

        public java.util.List<? extends com.alamkanak.weekview.WeekViewEvent> onMonthChange(int newYear,
                                                                                    int newMonth)
        Using Calendar library method Populate the calendar with events based on year and month,when month or year changes to allow calendar scrolling
        Parameters:
        newYear - year of the events required by the view.
        newMonth - month of the events required by the view. 1 based (not like JAVA API) --> January = 1 and December = 12
        Returns:
        a list of the events happening during the specified month

        Parameters:

        eventRect - event rectangle that was long pressed
